text: Andrew Kohut (September 2, 1942 â€“ September 8, 2015) was an American pollster and nonpartisan news commentator about public affairs topics. Kohut was the founding director of the Pew Research Center and served as director of the Pew Research Center's Global Attitudes Project. He served as the center's president from 2004 to 2012. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:Writers from Jersey City, New Jersey
title: Andrew Kohut
